well there is a button that magically spawns cube when you press it
try getting there the way you did before grabbing the cube

i like made puzzle 3 and everything before it is the tutorial basically

first box to the button above the exit
you can jump from the fizzler, and then grab the box on the ground
(dont forget you can save and load btw!!_

oh yeah the next move is funky, i can give you some time to think if you want
puzzles are not for those weak of brain...
put orange portal one block above
jump using bouncy into blue portal
you put orange portal below you
dont forget to refresh you djump before going into blue
now yo can reach the block
that you can turn off by staying on the button
you can drop the cube through portals
now just gotta somehow retrieve the second cube
luckily, there is a button that can make this cube appear in a jiffy
use the cube that you have at the exit
i miscoded the load so fizzler erases your portal if you save inside it
ok so there are several solutions, mine is
you leave the cube 2 (that you got most recently) where it is rn
put blue right next to the exit
don't remove cube 1 from that button

thanks, i went a little outside my comfort zone with some needle styles and was happy with most of it
the line needle is rough though, wish i'd made it better
would recommend playing on intended if you want more of a consistency test, but medium for more smooth sailing
the jumps are fairly precise actually, so maybe medium is better for you
i've been experimenting with lots of open space in needle design and it's really nice to just go where the jumps naturally take you
lol yeah, glad medium was selected instead
gotta do whatever maximizes personal enjoyment
yeah mauri also acknowledged that he wasn't too familiar with making consistency stuff, so i appreciated the effort he made regardless
